trans-unit.source: Represents the look and feel of a column in a table layout.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> class represents the user interface (UI) characteristics of column in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
The styles for all the columns in such a table are collected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
This simple class offers the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> properties for a column.
Initializes and instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle"></xref> class to its default state.

This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A> property to 0.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle"></xref> class using the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"></xref> value.
This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A> property to 0.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType"></xref> indicating how the column should be should be sized relative to its containing table.
Initializes and instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle"></xref> class using the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"></xref> and width values.
The exact meaning of the `width` parameter will vary depending on the `sizeType` parameter.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType"></xref> indicating how the column should be should be sized relative to its containing table.
The preferred width, in pixels or percentage, depending on the sizeType parameter.
width is less than 0.
Gets or sets the width value for a column.
The `width` parameter will take on different meanings depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> property.
`sizeType` value
`width` interpretation
The preferred column width in pixels (fractional portion ignored).
Not applicableâ€”the width parameter is ignored.
The preferred column width as a percentage of the containing table.
The preferred width, in pixels or percentage, depending on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType"></xref> property.
The value is less than 0 when setting this property.
